response.overview: Synopsis: There are rules in being a man and living in society. Ye Long is a man of rules. He was initially the best "clerk" of the Tang Group. However, having been framed, he was hunted by the owner of the Group. Only Tang Wanning, his childhood friend, believed that Ye Long was innocent. They survived a narrow escape from death and fled to his good friend Daxiong's house. Unfortunately, the mastermind did not stop and had Daxiong murdered while Ye Long and Tang Wanning were out looking for the truth. Ye Long, Tang Wanning, and others got caught up in the lies of conspiracy
response.title: City Of Chaos
